Package com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.engine.optimizer.core

Class Summary
BasicPatternGraph Abstraction of a BasicPattern as a Graph.
BasicPatternJoin The class implements a number of operation applicable on joined triple patterns (BGP)
BasicPatternOptimizer Implementation of basic graph pattern optimizer.
BasicPatternVisitor The visitor is used to inspect the BGP of a query pattern element.
ConnectedGraph The class implements a connected graph, i.e. a component of the BasicPatternGraph, and the abstract optimization logic based on node and edge costs.
GraphEdge This class implements a GraphEdge used to describe an edge of a Graph.
GraphNode This class implements a GraphNode used to describe the node of a Graph.
OptimizerBase Abstract class for ARQo optimizer's.
PrimeNumberGen The class is a prime number generator.
